name: PewPew Pete
description:
Play as the small, mech driving alien called Pete! As he Lasers his way through many obstacles. Turning them into goo and then turning the goo back into a solid!

This is a character demo for Xanderwood's Game Design Knock Out Round 1, with a short level to show some of the mechanics. This will most likely get fleshed out more in future GDKO rounds

A/D = Left/right movement

W = Jump

R = Restart Level

Left Slick = Melt Blocks

Right Click = Solidify Goo
